entry.title: Game: Regency Solitaire (Steam, 2015) (10)
entry.content:
Game: Regency Solitaire (Steam, 2015) (10)20161214
I went through two chapters. The second one required a lot of
Retries before I was able to progress on the initial Hands, but it
was very rewarding. I played this style of Solitaire in meat space
with my kids, who have been seeing me play on the computer and
wanted to try. It was very cute.

Total time: 8:21

  • Regency Solitaire
  • Steam
  • 2015

entry.title: Movie: Ben-Hur, directed by Timur Bekmambetov (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: Ben-Hur, directed by Timur Bekmambetov (2016)20161214
This was an exciting movie that was clearly trying to do way more
than could be done in the time alotted. I think that most people
who are unfamiliar with the book would find all the Christian stuff
out of place and maybe even insulting because all the Jews in the
movie become Christians. I think it felt strangely forced and only
there because it's such a huge part of the book, when the movie
really just wants to be about action.
  • Movies
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (9)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (9)20161212
I played for about an hour and went through the story bits of
chapter three and got to chapter four. It was weird to have to
sleep and tally EXP so many times. Now that I have the beast
whistle and another day, I'm going to go on another mission binge
and do some AP farming.

--

I spent about two hours doing AP grinding. It was very exciting to
unlock more stuff! I think I will do it a bit more.

--

I spent another hour and a half and did more AP farming. I will be
done for now and go do some missions.

Total time: 28:01
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 15
  • PS4
  • 2016

entry.title: Movie: Midnight Special, by Jeff Nichols (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: Midnight Special, by Jeff Nichols (2016)20161211
This was a really weird movie. I liked how I had no idea what it
was going to end up being about and went in so many weird
directions. The references to the Yearning For Zion ranch were
uncomfortable, but not too bad. The fantastic world portrayed
really makes no sense though.
  • Movies
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (8)20161210
I played three two hour sessions today. It was a lot of fun and I
completed a ton of missions. I explored the whole area that is
unlocked, except for right around Lestallum (I was worried about
automatically getting sucked into the end of the main quest
mission.) I also didn't go to the barricade in the upper left of
the map and didn't go out all the way to the building in the
southern cape. I managed to get two new Royal Arms and was
surprised to be able to beat the Bandersnatch. I generally was
able to fight monsters up to Level 38 or 40-ish. I cashed in my
EXP and went from Level 25 to Level 43 in one go, which was pretty
cool. It worked out to about 190k. I ended up with 275 AP and
spent almost all of it on a bunch of good stuff. I think I will do
some AP grinding at the beginning of the next chapter. This game
is really excellent.

Total time: 23:26
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 15
  • PS4
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (7)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (7)20161207
I did a lot more quests today. I'm racking up a lot of gil and
trying to decide when a good time to cash in my EXP is. I don't
feel like I need it to deal with the challenges I am currently
facing, but I also don't feel like I am hurting for money either,
so I could afford to.

Total time: 17:03

  • Final Fantasy 15
  • PS4
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (6)20161206
I did lots of quests and hunts. Some of them were quite difficult,
but I'm getting used to using the "Warp-Strike and run away"
technique. It works pretty well. I did the content that the
Episode Duscae demo was remixed from, which was pretty neat. I
also made my TODO list, which is quite overwhelming. I'm having a
blast with this game.

Total time: 15:23
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 15
  • PS4
  • 2016
